content.raw:
The [latest jenkins build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64/15/testReport/) is much improved. Still just a few failures:

* `INTEGRATION_camera` test failed, and it spit out a long ruby backtrace, even though I think the failure happened somewhere else.
* the cmake and example_plugins tests are failing. I've reproduced it on my machine, and I'm not sure what's going on.
content.html:
The latest jenkins build is much improved. Still just a few failures:

  • INTEGRATION_camera test failed, and it spit out a long ruby backtrace, even though I think the failure happened somewhere else.
  • the cmake and example_plugins tests are failing. I've reproduced it on my machine, and I'm not sure what's going on.
